languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас мрачно кивает.{/n} "Новости о его измене добрались до Даргонуса слишком поздно. Кунрад появился на планете и почти сразу же ее покинул, посеяв смуту в умах легковерных и наивных. Худший из слухов, что он пустил — что именно вы виновны в скоропостижной кончине Леди Теодоры. Разумеется, ваши преданные подданные сделали все возможное, чтобы содрать кожу с усомнившихся. Но вряд ли стража добралась до всех, кто позволил сомнению поселиться в душе и ныне пестует его втихомолку".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас мрачно кивает.{/n} "Новости о его измене добрались до Даргонуса слишком поздно. Кунрад появился на планете и почти сразу же ее покинул, посеяв смуту в умах легковерных и наивных. Худший из слухов, что он пустил — что именно вы виновны в скоропостижной кончине леди Теодоры. Разумеется, ваши преданные подданные сделали все возможное, чтобы содрать кожу с усомнившихся. Но вряд ли стража добралась до всех, кто позволил сомнению поселиться в душе и ныне пестует его втихомолку".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас мрачно кивает.{/n} "Новости о его измене добрались до Даргонуса слишком поздно. languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯阴沉地点了点头。{/n}“他叛国的消息传到达戈努斯时，已经太迟了。昆拉德刚一来到这颗行星，就在那些轻信别人、容易受骗的人心中撒下了不和的种子，之后就立刻离开了。他散布的最糟糕的谣言，是说西奥多拉夫人的突然死亡与您脱不开干系。当然，但凡有人胆敢流露出对您的怀疑，您忠诚的臣民们就会立刻将他们生吞活剥。但即便如此，守卫们恐怕也没办法揪出每个内心深处心怀疑虑，并任由这种怀疑慢慢扩大的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas asiente con severidad.{/n} «La noticia de su traición llegó tarde a Dargonus. Kunrad vino al planeta y se fue al poco tiempo, después de sembrar la discordia en los corazones de los crédulos y los ingenuos. Según el peor de los rumores que propagó, es usted responsable direct{mf|o|a} de la muerte de lady Theodora. Naturalmente, sus fieles súbditos hicieron todo lo posible por desollar a quienes dudan de usted, pero es poco probable que los guardias pudieran atrapar a todos los que dudan y ahora lo guardan en secreto».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

Kunrad vino al planeta y se fue al poco tiempo, después de sembrar la discordia en los corazones de los crédulos y los ingenuos. Según el peor de los rumores que propagó, es usted responsable direct{mf|o|a} de la muerte de lady Theodora. Naturalmente, sus fieles súbditos hicieron todo lo posible por desollar a quienes dudan de usted, pero es poco probable que los guardias pudieran atrapar a todos los que dudan y ahora lo guardan en secreto».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは険しい顔でうなずく。{/n}「彼の反逆の言葉がダルゴナスに届いたときは手遅れでした。クンラッドはこの星に来てからすぐに去ることで、だまされやすい者、世間知らずな者の心に疑念をまきました。クンラッドが広め始めた噂の中でも悪質なのは、陛下がシオドーラ様の突然死に関与している、というものです。もちろん忠誠心の高い臣下たちは懸命になって何者かが持ち出した疑惑の根拠を潰しています。しかし、心に疑念を抱くのは自由、今や人目につかぬ場所で疑念の目を育てよと、ワーデンたちが触れ回ったとは考えられないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは険しい顔でうなずく。{/n}「彼の反逆の言葉がダルゴナスに届いたときは手遅れでした。クンラッドはこの星に来てからすぐに去ることで、だまされやすい者、世間知らずな者の心に疑念をまきました。クンラッドが広め始めた噂の中でも悪質なのは、陛下がシオドーラ様の突然死に関与している、というものです。もちろん忠誠心の高い臣下たちは懸命になって何者かが持ち出した疑惑の根拠を潰しています。しかし、心に疑念を抱くのは自由、今や人目につかぬ場所で疑念の目を育てよと、ワーデンたちが触れ回ったとは考えられないのです」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas nickt grimmig.{/n} "Die Kunde von seinem Verrat hat Dargonus zu spät erreicht. Kunrad kam auf den Planeten und verließ ihn sofort wieder, nachdem er Zwietracht bei den Leichtgläubigen und Naiven gesät hatte. Das schlimmste seiner Gerüchte lautete, Ihr wärt für für das plötzliche Hinscheiden von Lady Theodora verantwortlich. Natürlich waren Eure treuen Untertanen bemüht, jedem bei lebendigem Leib die Haut abzuziehen, der Anzeichen von Zweifel zeigte. Aber es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass die Wachen alle erwischt haben, die diesen Zweifel in ihr Herz gelassen haben, und nun wächst er im Geheimen."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

Kunrad kam auf den Planeten und verließ ihn sofort wieder, nachdem er Zwietracht bei den Leichtgläubigen und Naiven gesät hatte. Das schlimmste seiner Gerüchte lautete, Ihr wärt für für das plötzliche Hinscheiden von Lady Theodora verantwortlich. Natürlich waren Eure treuen Untertanen bemüht, jedem bei lebendigem Leib die Haut abzuziehen, der Anzeichen von Zweifel zeigte. Aber es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass die Wachen alle erwischt haben, die diesen Zweifel in ihr Herz gelassen haben, und nun wächst er im Geheimen."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas hoche la tête d'un air sombre.{/n} « Nous avons hélas appris sa trahison trop tard, ici, sur Dargonus. Kunrad n'est resté sur la planète que le temps de semer la discorde dans les esprits des plus crédules. Il a notamment répandu une rumeur abjecte prétendant que vous aviez vous-même tué dame Théodora. Bien entendu, vos sujets les plus loyaux se sont empressés d'écorcher vif tous ceux qui ont ne serait-ce que fait mine de le croire, mais nul doute que certains sont passés entre les mailles du filet et continuent à nourrir des doutes en secret. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas hoche la tête d'un air sombre.{/n} « Nous avons hélas appris sa trahison trop tard, ici, sur Dargonus. Kunrad n'est resté sur la planète que le temps de semer la discorde dans les esprits des plus crédules. Il a notamment répandu une rumeur abjecte prétendant que vous aviez vous-même tué dame Théodora. Bien entendu, vos sujets les plus loyaux se sont empressés d'écorcher vif tous ceux qui ont ne serait-ce que fait mine de le croire, mais nul doute que certains sont passés entre les mailles du filet et continuent à nourrir des doutes en secret. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, katı bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "İhanetinin haberi Dargonus'a çok geç ulaştı. Kunrad gezegene geldi, kolay aldanan ve naif kişilerin zihnine ihtilaf tohumları eker ekmez de gezegenden ayrıldı. Yaydığı söylentilerin en kötüsü, Leydi Theodora'nın ani vefatından sizin mesul olduğunuzdu. Sadık tebaanız, şüphe ibaresi gösteren herkesin derisini canlı canlı yüzmek için elinden geleni yaptı elbette. Ancak dizdarların, kalbine şüphe düşüp bunu gizliden gizliye büyüten herkesi yakalayabilmiş olması çok zor."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas nods grimly.{/n} "Word of his treason reached Dargonus too late. Kunrad came to the planet and left it almost immediately, once he had sown discord in the minds of the gullible and naive. The worst of the rumours he started was that you were the one responsible for Lady Theodora's sudden demise. Of course, your loyal subjects did their best to skin alive any who showed signs of doubt. But it seems unlikely that the wardens got to everyone who has allowed doubt into their heart and now nurtures it in secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas katı bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "İhanetinin haberi Dargonus'a çok geç ulaştı. Kunrad gezegene geldi ve kolay aldanan ve naif kişilerin zihnine ihtilaf tohumları eker ekmez neredeyse anında gezegenden ayrıldı. Yaydığı söylentilerin en kötüsü Leydi Theodora'nın ani vefatından sizin sorumlu olduğunuzdu. Elbette sadık tebaalarınız şüphe ibaresi gösteren herkesin derisini canlı canlı yüzmek için elinden geleni yaptı ancak muhafızların kalbine şüphe düşen herkesi yakalayabilmiş olması çok zor ve bu şüpheler artık gizliden gizliye büyümekte."
